name: Word Cycle
description:
Word Cycle is a game based on other similar word based. 

The goal is to have one player read the word and give clues without saying the word while the other player guess it.

The idea was not mine, but I wanted to recreate it and add a little more color and maybe later more.

The three button game jam took place as I started developing this project and because it only has three buttons and fit the theme, I thought I would upload it to the jam.

Assets are made by noahaslan development

If you have suggestions, please feel free to let me know and I hope you.
